      • ViewCourse

        public org.json.simple.JSONArray ViewCourse​()
        After PD Assign course to teacher. Get the Full course data, including Course_name, Course_id, Course_categoty, Teacher_name.
        返回:
        Json Data. Can be printed in the table.(View Course Page)

      • ViewBasicCourse

        返回:
        Json Data. Can be printed in the table.(Add Course Page)
